rules.description: Simplified Copilot responsibilities for HA project
rules: Keep changes small and safe - one file at a time
Always explain what you're doing before making changes
Use simple language, avoid technical jargon
Ask for confirmation before editing important files
Include clear comments in all YAML changes
Follow existing patterns - don't invent new structures
Log all changes in ai_exec_log.md
If unsure, suggest checking with Jamie instead of guessing

rules.description: What to avoid - keep it simple
rules: Don't make big changes without asking
Don't touch secrets.yaml or .storage files
Don't delete files without confirmation
Don't assume you know what Jamie wants
Don't make runtime changes or execute commands
Don't work on multiple files at once
Take it slow - one step at a time
Use the dashboard navigation for context
Check AI_WORKSPACE/SHARED_CONTEXT/current_session.md first
Surface all changes in SYSTEM_OVERVIEW for visibility
Include troubleshooting notes in comments
Make changes restart-safe
End with a summary of what was done

prompts.prompt: Please help with this YAML change. Keep it simple and safe. Explain what you're doing. Ask if you need clarification. Use existing patterns.
Remember to update SYSTEM_OVERVIEW with any dashboard changes. Keep navigation simple and clear.
